channel.title: CVE Feed for Cloud Software Group -- NetScaler ADC
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cloud Software Group -- NetScaler ADC

item.title: CVE-2023-6549|2024-08-02T08:35:13.934Z -- cloud%20software%20group -- netscaler%20adc
item.description: Improper Restriction of Operations within the Bounds of a Memory Buffer in NetScaler ADC and NetScaler Gateway allows Unauthenticated Denial of Service and Out-Of-Bounds Memory Read

item.title: CVE-2023-4967|2024-08-02T07:44:53.479Z -- cloud%20software%20group -- netscaler%20adc
item.description: Denial of Service in NetScaler ADC and NetScaler Gateway when configured as a Gateway (VPN virtual server, ICA Proxy, CVPN, RDP Proxy) or AAA Virtual Server

item.title: CVE-2023-6548|2024-08-02T08:35:14.029Z -- cloud%20software%20group -- netscaler%20adc
item.description: Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection') in NetScaler ADC and NetScaler Gateway allows an attacker with access to NSIP, CLIP or SNIP with management interface to perform Authenticated (low privileged) remote code execution on Management Interface.
